title: Creamy goat's cheese tagliatelle with toasted hazelnuts
ingredients: ['300 g (10½ oz) tagliatelle', '90 ml (3 fl oz) semi-skimmed milk', "150 g (5½ oz) medium-fat soft goat's cheese", '2 tsp finely chopped fresh tarragon', '6 spring onions, finely sliced', '2–3 tbsp finely chopped toasted hazelnuts', 'salt and pepper']
